overview:
What do you do? My job is to run Autoquake.com’s finances which means managing a great finance team and measuring the company’s performance. The hardest part, though, is forecasting the incredible growth that Autoquake.com is experiencing.

Why work for Autoquake.com? Not only is Autoquake.com a vibrant and ever evolving company, it also has huge potential which I want to help to realise using my variety of relevant and other business experience.

What did you do before? I qualified and spent 8 years with Deloitte & Touche, a world leading firm of chartered accountants before branching out into commerce, spending a further 8 years in a large car supermarket group where I progressed to Chief Financial Officer. I have also spent a number of years in the water industry, most recently at a listed water company.

What do you drive? A Nissan Qashqai it is small enough to be great around town, but big enough to transport my 2 young daughters and everything they need!
